content:
Hi All, i am getting this error, i want to resolve this problem
Thank YouUntitled123456.png
It looks like you have a bad XML file somewhere. You need to ensure all of your XML files are valid against their respective schemas - for example using a validating editor such as XML Spy or Oxygen.

@Lloyd McKenzie i am using the oxygen editor i am getting this :
System ID: D:\VhDir-pft\resources\CN-PFT.structuredefinition.xml
Main validation file: D:\VhDir-pft\resources\CN-PFT.structuredefinition.xml
Engine name: oXygen
Severity: error
Description: There is no schema or DTD associated with the document. You can create an association either with the Associate Schema action or configuring in the Options the Preferences/Document Type Association list, or by creating a Validation Scenario.
When validating, you'll have to tell oxygen what schema to validate against - easiest is to always use fhir-single.xsd.
